project.name: SARL Agent Oriented Programming Language
project.description: SARL is a general-purpose agent-oriented language. SARL aims at providing the fundamental abstractions for dealing with concurrency, distribution, interaction, decentralization, reactivity, autonomy and dynamic reconfiguration.

developer.name: Stéphane Galland
developer.organization: Université de Bourgogne Franche-Comté. Université de Technologie de Belfort-Montbéliard.

developer.name: Nicolas Gaud
developer.organization: Université de Bourgogne Franche-Comté. Université de Technologie de Belfort-Montbéliard.

developer.name: Alexandre Lombard
developer.organization: Université de Bourgogne Franche-Comté. Université de Technologie de Belfort-Montbéliard.

roles.role: Fixes for localization support within the fireworks example
